Uses of Package
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

  • Packages that use com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search 
    Package Description
    com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene
    Main pilots for indexing and searching, see especially Alix
    com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search
    Objects to search and calculate lexical statistics from an index (ex: found occurrences by facet)
    com.github.oeuvres.alix.web
    JspTools tools
  • Classes in com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search used by com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene 
    Class Description
    FieldFacet
    A dedicated dictionary for facets, to allow similarity scores.
    FieldInt
    Retrieve all values of an int field, store it in docId order, calculate some stats..
    FieldRail
    Persistent storage of full sequence of all document search for a field.
    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    Scale
    Handle data to display results as a chronology, according to subset of an index, given as a bitset.
  • Classes in com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search used by com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

    FieldInt.IntEnum

    FieldText
    An object recording different stats for a lucene text field.
    FormEnum
    This object is build to collect list of forms with useful stats for semantic interpretations and score calculations.

    sort order
    Scale.Tick
    A row of data for a crossing axis
